NG0212:1: dril dang rkyang pa las kyi sdebs //
NG0212:2: rtsa ba 'bru brgyad spu gri bcas //
NG0212:3: 'khor lo thod pa bcas pas grub //
NG0212:4: ma grub sbyor ba stobs zhan na //
NG0212:5: dril ba'i mtha' ru spu gri bsgyur //
NG0212:6: drag sngags rnal bzlog dkrugs pas sdebs //
NG0212:7: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis /
NG0212:8: sku gsung thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:9: ra dza nr-i dza thum ril ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:10: srog la hur thum rtsa la ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:11: srog la hur thums yam thun rmug ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:12: srog la mugs dza tri shag ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:13: srog la nr-i dza thun rmug ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:14: tsit+ta kham shag dza srog la ma ra ya thun rbad /
NG0212:15: 'dod pa'i ming dang a mu ka / las kyi skabs su shes par bya //
NG0212:16: sngags kyi 'khor lo nang gcod dang */
NG0212:18: dam tshig dme 'khrug byung ba la //
NG0212:19: dpa' bo chen pos las 'di bshad //
NG0212:20: spyang ki mon kyi thod pa dang *//
NG0212:21: mu zi nag po mdze can snel /
NG0212:23: rabs chad nag po'i thod par mnan //
NG0212:24: 'di dag las kun yang rab ste //
NG0212:25: rang gshed nag po las mthar phyin //
NG0212:27: sdig pa ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0212:28: gsang ba yang snying gi le'u ste drug pa'o //
NG0212:29: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ban sgra nag
NG0212:30: po stobs dang 'bral ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so
NG0212:31: // dbang chen stobs dang dbral ba dag / dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas su //
NG0212:32: sna tshogs drag po'i sa dag la //
NG0212:33: mchod rten nag po bang rim gsum //
NG0212:34: dug khrag dag gis rab tu byug / gri rgod ras sam rgya shog la //
NG0212:35: ban dgra nag po'i ling+ga bri //
NG0212:36: rkang rjes skra dang chu ngan sa //
NG0212:37: bag phye khrag dang kham sa ru //
NG0212:38: mdzub gang dbang po dod pa la //
NG0212:39: sny-ing gar ming rus gzhug par bya //
NG0212:40: lce steng du ni lnga yi mtshon //
NG0212:42: rgya gram thugs nyid las gyis thug pa'i lam gy-i 'jom las yin nam dpyad / mdzes //
NG0212:43: srog 'dus lha srin snying pos mnan //
NG0212:44: steng du ri rab mchod rten bzhag / gnas khang steng ngam shar du mnan //
NG0212:45: rtsol bsgrub phrin las ci byas kyang *//
NG0212:46: ngag gi nus pa stobs kyis 'ching *//
NG0212:47: dam tshig ldan dang sngags gcig pa'i //
NG0212:48: rgyud gsum nus pa stobs dang bral //
NG0212:49: ha la nag po stam+b+ha ri //
NG0212:51: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs can mnan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:54: bi kr-i ta na na hum [\[]bar 'dir mchan yod kyang mi gsal /[\]]s+t+wam+b+ha ya /
NG0212:55: lam lam lam lam nan tak+she na /
NG0212:65: he rak+sha trag tu brag dun ting b+hi la ni /
NG0212:67: tri sha na ra tsa ha sti /
NG0212:68: ra tsa mu trag sha trum ti sta /
NG0212:74: na ga / de ba ru tri /
NG0212:77: tri srog la ma ra ya /
NG0212:80: ka la du brag byi ru+u ra /
NG0212:84: e che ge mo a mu kam du du nan /
NG0212:88: spur ya nan man tra nan /
NG0212:89: kham shag ro myags mug ti rbad /
NG0212:90: bstan pa spyi la gnod pa yi //
NG0212:91: ban 'dra mu stegs dag la bya //
NG0212:92: kun la byas na sngags kun gyi //
NG0212:93: nus pa nyams par 'gyur bas na //
NG0212:94: rnal 'byor can gyis bya bar bshad //
NG0212:95: las 'di ya bag sha yin pas //
NG0212:96: phung byed nag po'i sbyor bar bshad //
NG0212:97: sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang rgyud las /
NG0212:98: stobs can nus pa dbral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o
NG0212:99: // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo
NG0212:100: rje nang 'gras kyi las 'byung ba'i khram bzlog chen
NG0212:101: po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:102: dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu //
NG0212:103: rigs dang rigs min sbyor ba 'joms //
NG0212:104: stobs gzir pho nya bzlog cing mnan //
NG0212:105: rigs can sbyor ba dbang du bsdu //
NG0212:106: rigs med yul gyi lus srog dbral //
NG0212:107: yugs za mo yi zhabs ma dang *//
NG0212:108: sa dkar cong zis mdog phyung la //
NG0212:109: 'khor lo rim pa lnga ru bskor //
NG0212:110: gru gsum nag po ming tshar bri //
NG0212:111: zla gam lha dang ming rus bri //
NG0212:112: mu khyud sbrul gyis rab tu bskor //
NG0212:113: 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0212:114: phyi rim rgya gram ral gris gtams //
NG0212:115: yang logs bcu drug gsod dang gnon /
NG0212:116: kha sbyar mu su'i thod par bru?b //
NG0212:117: zhag gsum thang bcad mal 'og mnan //
NG0212:118: stobs kyi pho nya'i rbod gtong 'chad //
NG0212:120: e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya /
NG0212:121: dgra bo a mu ka srog la thun rmugs rbad b+h+yo /
NG0212:125: dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:126: dgra bo'i srog stam+b+ha ya nan /
NG0212:127: las 'di yang snying gsang ba'i bcud //
NG0212:128: pho nya zlog pa'i las su bshad //
NG0212:130: sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0212:131: gzhan gyi rkang mgyogs bzlog cing mnan pa'i le'u ste
NG0212:132: brgyad pa'o // // de nas yang de'i tshe de'i
NG0212:133: dus na bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa snying 'dzings
NG0212:134: lha srin tsit+ta dkrug pa 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:135: dur khrod ras la dug khrag gis //
NG0212:136: snying gi 'khor lo bri bar bya //
NG0212:137: rtsa chen bzhi la dmar len 'bru //
NG0212:138: 'bru brgyad rang gnad bsnol mar gnas //
NG0212:139: rtsa bran brgyad dang sul brgyad du //
NG0212:140: tsit+ta dkrug pa'i spu gri bri //
NG0212:141: phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug bri //
NG0212:142: phyi rim mu khyud gdug pa lnga //
NG0212:143: 'chi bdag shan pa'i lto bar bri //
NG0212:144: de ltar 'khor lo kha sbyar bar //
NG0212:145: dmigs pa'i ling+ga bris te gzhug / zhag bdun bar du ma yengs par //
NG0212:148: yang gsang thugs kyi las mchog yin //
NG0212:149: phyag rgya zil gnon gsal bar bsgom //
NG0212:150: las kyi 'khor lo lto dkrug pas //
NG0212:151: srog dang grog srog kyang gi ming sdeb can //
NG0212:152: gzas pa'i tsit+ta dkrug par byed //
NG0212:153: rtsa phran brgyad dang rtsa chen bzhi //
NG0212:154: las kyi dmod pa'i mtshon chas gcod //
NG0212:155: rtsa srog bcad nas rnam shes phrogs //
NG0212:156: 'chi bdag bdud kyi las su rig / 'jig rten lha srin thams cad kun //
NG0212:157: gshed bdag nag po'i lto na 'chang *//
NG0212:158: ru tra de yi rgyud la gnas //
NG0212:159: de yis rang srog rang gis gcod //
NG0212:160: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa snying 'dzings tsit+ta dkrug pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:161: e dun ka yam e myags ya rngubs /
NG0212:163: ya ma ra tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo'i nr-i ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:164: ma ma ru lu ma tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo nr-i ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:177: tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo nr-i ma ra ya rbad /
NG0212:178: de yi las de ma grub na //
NG0212:180: tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo'i srog la breng shag nr-i ma
NG0212:181: ra ya rbad rbad gsum yang 'dug / mtha' sdud
NG0212:183: sdig pa'i lus chang brtags la gtad //
NG0212:184: thod pa dur ma'i las yin pas //
NG0212:185: gsang sngags grong khyer dkrug pa ste //
NG0212:186: gnad la dbab zhing bsad pa zhes //
NG0212:188: stobs chen dril ba'i las su bshad //
NG0212:189: sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0212:190: tsit+ta dkrug pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o // // de
NG0212:191: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bsrung
NG0212:193: e nyid stong pa chos 'byung zhes //
NG0212:194: ma skyes 'gag pa med pa las //
NG0212:195: rgyu rkyen sngags las ma bskyed par //
NG0212:196: rol pa chen po'i sku ru gsal //
NG0212:197: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad //
NG0212:198: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngam //
NG0212:199: rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri g.yas //
NG0212:200: be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon //
NG0212:201: rigs lnga'i khro bos dbu+u la brgyan //
NG0212:202: rang gi phyag rgya chen pos brjid //
NG0212:203: sbrul dang rin chen 'bar ba dang *//
NG0212:204: dregs pa'i mgo bcad phreng bas brgyan //
NG0212:205: klu rigs du mas sku la spras //
NG0212:206: yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings //
NG0212:207: mthing nag tsit+ta b+han dmar stob //
NG0212:208: thugs kar smug nag ya ma gnas //
NG0212:209: me long ye shes ngo bo nyid //
NG0212:210: 'khor lo don snying phyag na bsnams //
NG0212:211: ya ma'i thugs kar dregs pa che //
NG0212:212: mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid //
NG0212:213: ljang nag rdo rje snying phreng 'dzin //
NG0212:214: dregs pa'i thugs kar khyams khang ste //
NG0212:215: bya ba nan tan ye shes nyid //
NG0212:216: 'jigs byed chen po thur du blta //
NG0212:217: dbu gtsug mkha' lding gdug pa 'dul //
NG0212:218: so sor kun rtog ye shes nyid //
NG0212:221: phrag sor smug nag 'jigs pa'i khyung *//
NG0212:222: dpung par stag chen ro la rngams //
NG0212:223: nu 'jing seng ge ral pa sprug / sta zur
NG0212:224: dug sbrul nag po 'khyug / sangs rgyas kun gyi
NG0212:225: ngo bo nyid // rdo rje 'chang rgyal spyi gzugs can //
NG0212:226: ma skyes ngang las rang bzhin 'char //
NG0212:227: gdod nas rnam dag ye shes sku //
NG0212:228: bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod mi dgos //
NG0212:229: rgyu dang rkyen la rag ma lus //
NG0212:230: skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes gsal //
NG0212:231: phyag rgya kun gyi zil gnon yin //
NG0212:232: rol pa chen po'i phrin las kyi //
NG0212:233: gsang sngags phreng ba denyid las //
NG0212:234: bod pa ming dang brda' ru sbyar //
NG0212:235: rnam par shes pa 'bru re phrogs //
NG0212:236: dregs pa 'dul byed gsang sngags srog / zil gnod gsung gi ngo bo nyid //
NG0212:237: 'di nyid mchog gi las yin pas //
NG0212:238: 'di med las kun dbyug pa rkyang *//
NG0212:239: rbod gtong 'khrug gam thun mong du //
NG0212:240: rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa yis //
NG0212:241: dregs pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa 'joms //
NG0212:242: sdig pa nag po snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0212:243: phyag rgya chen po srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ///
NG0212:244: / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos des /
NG0212:245: klu bdud 'chi bdag gdug pa can chu srin mgo can dbang du bsdus te /
NG0212:246: las kyi 'khrul 'khor gtad log nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:247: rus sbal nag po mjing bsnol gyi //
NG0212:249: ta la'i lo ma'am ka ri ka / yang na rgya shog dag la yang *//
NG0212:250: klu rigs bzhi dang sa bdag dang */
NG0212:251: dpe gcig la bar 'dir srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bris //
NG0212:252: 'khor lo rim pa bcu bzhi bskor //
NG0212:253: dbus su ling tshe dgu ru bya //
NG0212:255: zhes pa zhig byung yang tshig mtha' yang ma 'grig pas dpyad //
NG0212:256: klu yi yang snying gtad log dang *//
NG0212:257: rtsa ba'i snying po 'bru brgyad bzhi //
NG0212:258: 'dod pa'i ming rus a mu ka / nag po mgo dgu'i gsang sngags sbrel //
NG0212:259: yang gsang dpa' brtul can gyis spyad /
NG0212:261: dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza /
NG0212:262: srog la breng shag hur thums rbad /
NG0212:263: e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun na ga ru tra ka la dgra bo'i snying la b+h+yo /
NG0212:264: nag po bam tsit+ta la rgyob /
NG0212:265: trag thur snying sgul myags myags /
NG0212:268: thur thur dgra bo tsit+ta la thur rbad /
NG0212:269: sa na ga ha la tsa ma ri dgra bo'i snying la thun b+h+yo /
NG0212:270: zhag gsum mtshon cha bsnol mas gcod //
NG0212:271: mtha' ru dpa' brtul can gyis spyad //
NG0212:272: klu yi nad rlangs dug gi ngar /
NG0212:273: kha dag de la rang gshed dbab //
NG0212:274: 'di ni las kyi man tra ho //
NG0212:275: stobs chen 'joms pa drag po'i mtshon //
NG0212:276: sbyor ba mkhas pa'i sngags pa yis //
NG0212:277: las rdzogs rus sbal khog par gzhug / bang rim lnga pa'i 'og tu mnan //
NG0212:278: ri gsum 'brang gi rwa brag mnan //
NG0212:279: yang na sa bdag gnas sar gtad //
NG0212:280: las 'di mnan pa kun gyi mchog / ces gsungs so //
NG0212:283: gtad log nag po rus sbal mjing snol gyi le'u
NG0212:284: ste bcu gcig pa'o // // de nas bcom ldan
NG0212:285: 'das 'jigs byed chen po des 'khrul 'khor rdzas bzlog
NG0212:286: dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so
NG0212:287: // stobs chen 'khor lo'i gnad dag gis //
NG0212:288: las dang sbyor ba nus pa'i mthu //
NG0212:289: bung ba ri ka 'khor ba ltar //
NG0212:290: rang gi nus pa 'joms shing gsod //
NG0212:291: de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0212:292: ri rab 'og gam rgya mtsho'i gting *//
NG0212:293: gdug pa can gyi stobs gzhom phyir /
NG0212:294: kham sa'i ga'u rus sbal gyi //
NG0212:295: lto sbyar bar du rus sbal bca' //
NG0212:296: rgya shog dag la mu khyud gsum //
NG0212:297: gru gsum sdig pa ru 'dzings pa'i //
NG0212:299: bar ma'i mu khyud dregs pa can //
NG0212:302: skyom zhing sdud pa'i yang snying bri /
NG0212:303: e bam ram yam kham shig tsit+ta gtubs /
NG0212:305: mes tshig chus dkrug rlung gis g.yeng */
NG0212:306: kha ri ba ldag kha ri ldag rnam re tse
NG0212:307: ri khas yen sogs 'dra min mang sna ri khas
NG0212:308: yen / dgra bo ma ra ya /
NG0212:309: e ka ya ma srog la hur thum gzir nan /
NG0212:310: dgra bo'i snying la shag rbad /
NG0212:311: ra ti ra khrag dgra bo'i srog la yam yam tri ling dgra bo'i snying la shag rbad /
NG0212:312: nag po na ga b+he ta srog la dza la dza la /
NG0212:313: nr-i thum shag / dgra bo'i snying la rbad /
NG0212:314: tsit+ta breng shag nr-i ma ra ya /
NG0212:315: 'khor lo kha sbyar ga'ur gzhug / nam mkha' bar
NG0212:316: snang sa 'og gi / dbang chen stobs chen 'dus
NG0212:317: pa yin // 'og gi 'khrul 'khor gsang bar gshad //
NG0212:319: gshed po las rgyas lto ba ru //
NG0212:320: mu khyud rim pa lnga ru bskor //
NG0212:321: dbus su 'dod pa'i ming rus bri //
NG0212:322: g.yas g.yon 'doms su dam sri ru //
NG0212:323: klu srin sa srin snying po bri //
NG0212:324: snying la sdig pa bzhi bgrad pa //
NG0212:325: dmar len drag sngags 'bru brgyad bri //
NG0212:326: phyi rim yang snying 'khrul mig dag / brgyad bzhi dregs pa'i yang snying bri //
NG0212:327: tha ma 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtsibs //
NG0212:330: sarba sha trum s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan /
NG0212:332: pad+ma sbur srog nan snying gzer breng shag yam rbad /
NG0212:333: ri rab bang rim gsum pa'i khar //
NG0212:334: gru gsum nag po dug khrag byug / rabs chad thod par 'khrul 'khor bca' //
NG0212:335: sgo bzhi rdzogs pa'i mchod rten dag / rus sbal gdan la glang chen 'degs //
NG0212:336: sgo bzhi gri lcags sbug ma ru //
NG0212:337: drag po'i sngags thun mtshon chas brdar //
NG0212:338: bsad pa las kyi mtshon du bshad //
NG0212:339: nam mkhar phyag rgya gsal ba yi //
NG0212:340: stobs chen snying po rdzogs pa dang *//
NG0212:341: las rab kun gyi mchog tu bshad //
NG0212:342: sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang rgyud las /
NG0212:343: rdzas bzlog gsang ba 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o //    // de @#//
NG0212:344: nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des /
NG0212:345: gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0212:346: gdod nas rnam dag ye shes sku //
NG0212:347: lhun gyis grub pa yin pa la //
NG0212:348: stsol bsgrub re dogs 'dzin pa bral //
NG0212:349: rnam rtog bag chags sprin lta bu //
NG0212:350: nam mkha' lta bur 'dzin med pa //
NG0212:351: srung ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad //
NG0212:352: stong pa'i dbyings las rdzogs pa yi //
NG0212:353: phyag rgya'i rol pa yongs rdzogs pa //
NG0212:354: bsam gtan sems kyi 'khor lor bshad //
NG0212:0: [(]5[)]@#// sngags rnal bzlog snol mar brdeg / mnan pa 'brong gi ra brag mnan //
NG0212:355: rgyu dang 'bras bu srog dang las //
NG0212:356: dregs pa'i de nyid shes pa na //
NG0212:357: dreg pa rang gshed rang gis byed //
NG0212:358: bsam gtan 'khor lo byed pa na //
NG0212:359: sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis //
NG0212:360: ming dang rtog pa dbyings su bsgral //
NG0212:361: sngags kyi grong khyer rab bsgril zhing *//
NG0212:362: ming nas bos shing rab tu gzir //
NG0212:363: rnam shes 'phrog cing gcad bya ba //
NG0212:364: sngags kyi phreng bas gdug pa 'dul //
NG0212:365: dregs pas dkrugs shing dbang bsdus la //
NG0212:366: ming nas bos la thog ltar gzir //
NG0212:367: rnam shes 'phrog ste mtshon chas gcod //
NG0212:368: bsrung zhing bzlog pa'i las su rig / de nyid rang gshed pheb pas na //
NG0212:369: rno myur srid pa'i khyams khang na //
NG0212:370: rang gshed gdug pa'i yi ge gnas //
NG0212:371: drag sngags dbus kyi rta la zhon //
NG0212:373: sha za gsod byed pho nya bskul //
NG0212:374: rang gnad gdug pa'i yi ge blangs //
NG0212:377: hur thums dza yi nr-i phrogs nas //
NG0212:378: srid pa'i khyams khang mtshon chas gcod //
NG0212:379: 'di dag bsad pa'i las su rig / bskyed pa kha gso dug dbal gyis //
NG0212:380: rtsa rnams khengs nas nad rgyas nas //
NG0212:381: rtsa yi mdud bcad srog bral gyur //
NG0212:382: phyogs sam sgo bzhi las kyi thun /
NG0212:383: kha gso zor gyi las su shis //
NG0212:384: 'khor lo thun brdeg las rab mchog / rkyang pa sbrang ma las kyis sdebs //
NG0212:386: yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lor bshad //
NG0212:387: las kyi rgyal po'i snying nang du //
NG0212:388: rtsa bzhi mtshon gyis gcod par byed //
NG0212:389: dam med slob bu'i sems pa nyid //
NG0212:390: lcags kyi sdig pas rtsa brgyad za //
NG0212:391: dam 'dres bse yi sbal pa la //
NG0212:393: sngags pa nag po spyi yi sbun //
NG0212:394: rang gshed bse yi sbal pa yis //
NG0212:395: rnam shes dug khrag me chur bskol //
NG0212:396: bon po rigs gnyis phyi rol pa //
NG0212:397: phag rgod nad dang mtshon gyis bsgral //
NG0212:398: gnam lcags 'thab na rtog med las //
NG0212:399: phyag rgya rdzogs pas rol pa'i sku //
NG0212:400: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsgom //
NG0212:401: gzhan gyi stobs rnams rab tu gzir //
NG0212:402: las drug spyi yi dgongs par bshad //
NG0212:403: nag po stobs dang dbral ba dag / rgya gram dregs pa'i sngags bris te //
NG0212:404: lce steng ri rab dag gis mnan //
NG0212:405: zhi khro phur pa gshin rje nas //
NG0212:408: sngags kyi bzlas brjod ci byas pa //
NG0212:409: ri rab rgya gram chen po yis //
NG0212:410: ngag gi nus pa gnod par byed //
NG0212:411: nus pa non cig ces kyang brjod //
NG0212:412: drag po'i ngag mnan 'khor lo bshad //
NG0212:413: 'byung ba'i khram bzlog chen po ste //
NG0212:414: gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor ba yis //
NG0212:416: mtshon cha'i 'khor lo log pa ltar /
NG0212:417: kho rang rgyud la ldog pa ni //
NG0212:418: pho nya bzlog pa zhes su bshad //
NG0212:419: 'chi bdag shan pa'i lto ba ru //
NG0212:420: gsang ba'i sngags kyi lto dkrug pas //
NG0212:422: gzas pa'i rtsa srog 'bral bas ni //
NG0212:423: tsit+ta dkrug pa'i las su bshad //
NG0212:424: srid pa'i rus sbal lto ba ru //
NG0212:425: klu dang sa bdag sde bzhi la //
NG0212:426: stobs kyi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis //
NG0212:427: gdug pa'i klu gnyan dug blangs te //
NG0212:428: gzas pa'i snying la 'dus par bsam //
NG0212:429: gtad log nag po'i las su bshad //
NG0212:430: phyag rgya mtshon cha dmigs pa'i yul //
NG0212:431: gsal ba gsum gyis las kun 'grub //
NG0212:433: sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0212:434: yang gsang thugs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o //
NG0212:435: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su bskor
NG0212:436: ba'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
NG0212:437: e ma rnam rtog mtshan ma rang grol ba'i //
NG0212:438: rdo rje bde ba chen po'i bka' //
NG0212:439: gsang tshig dmod pa'i las mchog 'di //
NG0212:440: rig byed rdo rje snying pos zung *//
NG0212:441: skye med rnam dag chos dbyings pho brang nas //
NG0212:442: thugs rje'i rol pas bye brag cir bstan kyang *//
NG0212:443: gnyis med 'bras bu phyag rgya chen pos rdzogs //
NG0212:444: snang stong gnyis med ye shes sgyu ma'i sku //
NG0212:445: rtag chad mtha' las grol ba'i ye shes nyid /
NG0212:446: kho na nyid do gnyug ma rdo rje'i sku //
NG0212:447: phyag rgya chen pos zil gyis gnon par gnas //
NG0212:448: sku yi sgyu ma'i phyag rgya cir yang gnas //
NG0212:449: gsung ni khro bo rngams sgra lnga dang ldan //
NG0212:450: thugs ni sna tshogs cho 'phrul mtshon cha bzhin //
NG0212:451: las kyi skabs kyis phye ba de lta bu'i //
NG0212:452: ngo bo nyid ni chos sku 'gyur ba med //
NG0212:453: skye ba'i cho 'phrul snang la rang bzhin med //
NG0212:454: yon tan ye shes mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
NG0212:455: snying po 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang las 'char //
NG0212:456: thams cad chos sku bde ba chen po'i ngang *//
NG0212:457: bgrod pa rnam gsum thob pa'i rtsal gyi yod //
NG0212:458: e ma rno dbal mtshon cha'i mchog / sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings pa'i //
NG0212:459: snying po dug dbal dmod pa'i mchog khyad par gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di //
NG0212:460: dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyod //
NG0212:461: sdebs dang rkyang ba stobs dang sbyar //
NG0212:462: stobs ldan 'dzom na sbyor ba bsdeb //
NG0212:463: rgya mdud brtsegs pa'i lto ba'am //
NG0212:464: nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi'i 'og / 'khor lo rdzogs pa rdzas kyis gnad //
NG0212:465: ri rab mchod rten bar dag tu //
NG0212:466: stobs kyi 'khor lo thod par gzhug / phyag rgya gsal @#//
NG0212:468: dregs pa dkrug cing gnod byed gzir //
NG0212:469: rang gshed 'khor lo thun gyis brab //
NG0212:470: bla gnas gzugs la gnad yig dgod //
NG0212:471: mtha' bsgyur spu gri rno dbal sbyar //
NG0212:472: mgyogs bzhengs kyang kyi pho nya bzlag cing bsad //
NG0212:473: gdug pa klu yi gtad khram bzlog / bsdeb pa'i las rim skabs su sbyar //
NG0212:474: bsad pa'i las su shis par spyad //
NG0212:475: rgyun du lha srin stobs gzhom zhing *//
NG0212:476: ngag mnan 'khor lo bcas la mnan //
NG0212:477: stobs chen nus pa 'joms par bshad //
NG0212:478: tsit+ta dkrug pa'i rang gshed dbab //
NG0212:479: sdig pa'i lus tshad brtags la gtad //
NG0212:480: dregs pa 'khrugs na shis par bshad //
NG0212:481: e ma yang gsang rnal 'byor rgyud //
NG0212:482: thabs dang shes rab snying po'i don //
NG0212:483: rtsa ba bshad pa 'phrul gyi bka' //
NG0212:484: yang snying nag po gsang ba'i mtshon //
NG0212:486: gsang bdag rdo rje snying po dang *//
NG0212:487: longs spyod 'phrul ni sprul par bshad //
NG0212:490: byang sems bka' dang lung bor min //
NG0212:491: slob dpon mi spang spun mi brnyas //
NG0212:492: sangs rgyas bka' la nges par bkur //
NG0212:493: bla ma dkon mchog yi dam mchod //
NG0212:494: bdag gzhan byang chub sems mi gsad //
NG0212:495: don gyi lam stor log pa la //
NG0212:496: gsang sngags brda' dang dam mi smra //
NG0212:497: yongs su ma sbyangs tshad mi sbyar //
NG0212:498: theg pa dman la chos mi bshad //
NG0212:499: bka' la tshad ma'i sgras mi gzhal //
NG0212:500: dad ldan mi bzlog phyag rgya bstan //
NG0212:501: rin po che yi rtsal mi sprug / rnal 'byor mi gtang gsang sngags bzla //
NG0212:502: drod rtags dbang po rang nyams brtag / sems kyi me long rtag tu blta //
NG0212:504: lha klu dregs pa rdzu 'phrul can //
NG0212:505: nga yi gsang rgyud snying po 'di //
NG0212:506: ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na //
NG0212:507: de yi dam las mi 'da' srungs //
NG0212:508: 'khor gyi dregs pa pho mo yis //
NG0212:509: rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i grogs gyis shig / ces gsungs so //
NG0212:510: de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams //
NG0212:511: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la dga' mgu yi rang te mngon par bstod do //
NG0212:512: 'jam dpal gshin rje 'phrul 'khor nag po sdig pa snying 'dzings gsang ba'i rgyud las /
NG0212:513: rgyud gtad cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ///
NG0212:514: / 'jam dpal gshin rje dngos grub nye bar bsdus pa'i zla gsang nag po'i snying po'i rgyud /
NG0212:515: las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po sngag [\[]sngags [\]]pa snying 'dzing kyi rgyud ces bya ba //
NG0212:516: lha yul du grags pa rdzogs so // // bal
NG0212:517: yul gyi slob dpon chen po ba su d+ha ra
NG0212:518: dang */ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gnubs ban sangs rgyas ye shes bdag gis bsgyur ba'o //
